Gold Reserve requests clarification about US license protecting Citgo

June 25, 2025
  • Gold Reserve has filed an emergency request with a court in Delaware asking for clarification about a license by the U.S. Treasury Department that protects Citgo Petroleum.
  • The license was extended last week despite a court-organized auction to pay creditors.
  • Gold Reserve stated that the license is necessary to protect its interests in Citgo.
Gold Reserve has filed an emergency request with a court in Delaware asking for clarification about a license by the U.S. Treasury Department that protects Citgo Petroleum. The license was extended last week despite a court-organized auction to pay creditors. Gold Reserve stated that the license is necessary to protect its interests in Citgo. The company argued that the license is necessary to maintain the integrity of the auction process. The court is expected to rule on the matter in the coming days.
The license is necessary to protect its interests in Citgo.
Gold Reserve
